    question => UTF-8 string (250) "<h6>General Issues:</h6> <p>1. Ensure that where the client operates in mult...
    $value[0]['question']
    <h6>General Issues:</h6>
<p>1.	Ensure that where the client operates in multiple currencies, those charged with governance have justified what the entity’s functional currency is.  This should also be confirmed in the letter of representation.</p>

    question => UTF-8 string (621) "<h6>Directors’ Report::</h6> <p>2. Obtain a copy of the draft directors’ rep...
    $value[1]['question']
    <h6>Directors’ Report::</h6>
<p>2.	Obtain a copy of the draft directors’ report as early as possible in the audit process.  </p>
<p>a)	Review it for consistency with the rest of the annual report and financial statements;</p>
<p>b)	Review it for accordance with applicable legal requirements;</p>
<p>c)	Review for any material misstatements in light of the firm’s knowledge and understanding of the company.</p>

<p>Where necessary consider the impact on the firm’s audit opinion. Ensure that any weaknesses (which are not subsequently addressed) are communicated to the client in the management letter.</p>

    question => UTF-8 string (505) "<p>3. Ensure that information disclosed regarding the company’s financial ri...
    $value[2]['question']
    <p>3.	Ensure that information disclosed regarding the company’s financial risk management strategy and the use of financial instruments is in line with the auditor’s understanding and is consistent with the information in the rest of the audit file.  Also, ensure that the management has appropriately identified its exposure to the following risks:</p>
<ul>
    <li>•	Price risk;</li>
    <li>•	Credit risk;</li>
    <li>•	Liquidity risk; and</li>
    <li>•	Cash flow risk.</li>
</ul>

    <h6>Performance Statement(s) ~ Discontinued Operations</h6>

    <li>Later than one year but not later than five years;</li>
    <li>Later than five years.</li>
</ul>

    <h6>Statement of Financial Performance Notes</h6>
<p>14.	Ensure that financial instruments are appropriately classified as:</p>
<ul>
    <li>Financial assets and financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss;</li>
    <li>Held to maturity investments;</li>
    <li>Loans and receivables;</li>
    <li>Available-for-sale financial assets and financial liabilities other than those at fair value through profit or loss</li>
</ul>

    question => string (702) "<p>16. Documentation on the permanent file should ensure that a consistent a...
    $value[15]['question']
    <p>16.	Documentation on the permanent file should ensure that a consistent accounting treatment is adopted each period for items such as:-</p>
<ul>
    <li>Bank overdrafts (as noted above);</li>
    <li>Taxation;</li>
    <li>Interest receivable;</li>
    <li>Interest payable;</li>
    <li>Dividends receivable; and </li>
    <li>Dividends payable.</li>
</ul>
<p><i>NB:  This does not mean for example, that all taxation cash flows must be allocated to the same cash flow heading. However, it would be inappropriate to classify a taxation cash flow relating to the same underlying transaction in a different classification from prior periods (unless the treatment could be justified).</i></p>
    ⇄extent => string (0) ""
